Name: AGOS - A Game Of Space
About the game: Explore space and save humankind in AGOS : A Game of Space. Travel through different star systems, build and pilot space probes, collect resources and develop the technologies you need to face the dangers of space and ultimately save humankind. BECOME A SPACE PILOT Experience an innovative realistic physic based gameplay. ANALYSE, ADAPT, EVOLVE Build your probes, unlock new parts, improve your ship to face all the dangers that space can offer to unwary travellers. A UNIQUE VR EXPERIENCE Get into the cockpit, use your controllers to pilot, improve and customize your ships. Play for hours thanks to the motion sickness free system.
